events.title: Parent-Teacher Conference
events.description: Meet with teachers to discuss student progress and plans for the academic year.

events.title: Science Fair
events.description: Students present their science projects and experiments. Parents and guests are invited to attend.

events.title: Math Workshop
events.description: Interactive session to help students improve their math problem-solving skills.

events.title: Sports Day
events.description: A fun-filled day of sports activities and competitions for all grade levels.

events.title: Art Exhibition
events.description: Display of student artwork. Open to parents and community members to explore and enjoy.

events.title: School Assembly
events.description: A general assembly for important school announcements and student achievements.
